Author: bigbrainbigboi
Text: i told my ex (at the time gf) to keep the food gift card and i’ll take the movie theatre gift card we got as a shared gift bc food is fucking sCaRY ahahaha and she was down

Author: beyondhopeful
Text: I know it’s scary and you don’t have to use the gift cards right now, but maybe use that as a goal for yourself to go out to those restaurants with the gift cards. You don’t even need to push yourself to get something extremely fatty or whatever, pushing yourself to just get out a little is a smaller step! :) good luck!
